aboutSection.adopt.info: If you love spending time with a companion for life join us. We link you with different foundations and pets that are waiting for you. All you need to do is add your information
info.connect: We connect you with your dream pet
info.signUp: Sign up, click on foundation card, then select your favorite pet and you're ready to start the adoption process.
info.your.pet: Your dream pet is waiting for you
helpUs.message: If you aren't interested in adopting a pet, you can help the foundations maintain their herd with a donation.
